articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Thousands of flights delayed as Southwest glitch grounds planes - BBC
articles.description: The embattled airline cited a "technical issue" as the case for the one-hour nationwide stoppage.
articles.content:
Thousands of flights have been delayed in the United States after Southwest Airlines was forced to temporarily ground all flights because of a "technical glitch". 
The airline said it would work to … [+1073 chars]
